column4: how do I make it so I can drag windows off the right of workspace 1 and have them appear on workspace 2?
ok, I was thinking brightside was another suggestion for a replacement to gnome (flux, openbox, e, etc...)
it's lightweight, and gives you an uncluttered, naked desktop
I installed brightside, but dont see any edge-flipping.  there's no man page for it.  what now?
gnome-control-center, I think; there's a brightside config somewhere
brightside-properties.  seems to work well, thanks.
the bottom 70% shows noise - vertical lines
it looked like this when it was dying: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ojF-Mq9gqkA - now its more dead
